FROM community_board c, member m WHERE c.m_id = m.m_id AND classify = #{classify} AND ENABLE = 1
AND c.title LIKE '%${search}%'
AND REGEXP_REPLACE(c.content, "<[^>]+>|( )", '') LIKE '%${search}%'
AND m.name LIKE '%${search}%'
AND c.mp_id = #{search}
ORDER BY cb_id DESC
mapper.select: SELECT b.selected_date, IFNULL(a.cnt, 0) FROM ( SELECT reg_date AS yyyymmdd, COUNT(*) cnt FROM community_board WHERE reg_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(CURDATE(), INTERVAL -6 DAY) AND CURDATE() GROUP BY reg_date ) a RIGHT JOIN ( SELECT selected_date FROM (select adddate('1970-01-01',t4.i*10000 + t3.i*1000 + t2.i*100 + t1.i*10 + t0.i) selected_date from (select 0 i union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t0, (select 0 i union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t1, (select 0 i union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t2, (select 0 i union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t3, (select 0 i union select 1 union select 2 union select 3 union select 4 union select 5 union select 6 union select 7 union select 8 union select 9) t4) v where selected_date BETWEEN DATE_ADD(CURDATE(),INTERVAL -6 DAY) AND CURDATE() ) b ON a.yyyymmdd = b.selected_date ORDER BY b.selected_date ASC
